resources.string: Please authorize the application to use internal storage
Loading succeeded. Click the menu bar to start using!
Craft does not exist! Please check if the file name is wrong!
You need to modify at least one of them!
2.Fill in the name of your craft in the input box without . xml suffix
If an error is reported,that means the file name is filled incorrectly
当修改的内容较多时，可统一修改后再点击导出
点击右上角的清除按钮可以清除所有的修改
The first input box is for scale, which is used to enlarge or reduce the craft as a whole
To enlarge the craft to 200%, enter 2. Reduce the craft to 20%, enter 0.2, and so on
Only positive numbers can be entered in the input box, NO negative numbers!
If only the diameter is modified, it means to modify the width and depth of the fuel tank
When Craft Scale is checked, the processing of the fuel tank is changed to modify the part scale size in the Tinker Panel
The second input box is used to scale the mass size of all parts, for example:
When entering 2, the massScale will be changed to 200%, when entering 0.2, it will be changed to 20%, and so on
If you need to keep the original settings, please leave blank and do not enter anything
If you need to restore the default quality, please enter "default" in the Mass Scale input box (pay attention to case)
Click the button next to the text to pop up a drop-down list and select the attribute you want to be modified
The Part Collision mode corresponds to the part collision in the Tinker Panel
The Collision Response mode of the collision box corresponds to the Collision Response in the Tinker Panel
"DisOnly" in Collision Response mode corresponds to the DisconnectOnly option
When you need to keep the original property settings unchanged, please select the "Do not change" option before confirming
Craft Drag corresponds to Drag Scale value in Tinker Panel
Craft Drag Model Include In Drag
If you want to back to the default value of Drag Scale, enter "default"
Instructions for the use of Craft Resistance
The Part Health corresponds to the maxDamage attribute in the Config node, which refers to the maximum part blood volume
For example, if the default maxDamage of the rocket engine is not modified after the damage setting is added to the new version
Engines will explode when reaches 100% damage during it works
The Heat Resistance of the part corresponds to the value of the Heat Shield slider in the Advanced Part Setting
If you need to keep the setting of the original, Do not fill in any content in the input box. If you want to back to the default, enter "default" (pay attention to case)
Part Debris corresponding to the Prevent Debris switch in the Tinker Panel
Support Transparency of parts corresponds to the Supports Transparency switch in the Tinker Panel
Parts Cast Shadows corresponds to the Cast Shadows switch in the Tinker Panel
Fuel Tanks\' Texture switch is turned off, only the texture of all oil tanks will be set to None, and other parts will not be modified. Keep it open if necessary
The number of color checks in the Paint Tool tool corresponding to the color grid added
The maximum number of grids supported by the current version , 0.9.906 , is 50
That means there are only 25 checks can be added, and the surplus will not take effect
The Inertia Tensor User Scale corresponds to the inertiaTensorUserScale attribute of the Config node in the part and the existing Stability Modifier slider
The All-around Fuel Lines corresponds to the Fuel Line switch in Advanced Part Settings
If you need to keep the original value, please leave it blank and do not enter anything
\u3000\u3000如你所见，这是一个上帝模式，它能够赋予你，全新的力量。让你的Craft坚不可摧，你只需要点击下面的按钮即可称为上帝\u3000:)
上帝模式功能修改了以下属性
- collisionDisconnectImpulse -> 碰撞时冲量超过该值连接点将会断开
- collisionDisconnectVelocity -> 发生碰撞时速度超过该值连接点将会断开
- collisionExplodeImpulse -> 发生碰撞时冲量超过该值零件将会爆炸
- collisionExplodeVelocity -> 发射碰撞时速度超过该值零件将会爆炸
- collisionPreventExternalDisconnections -> 无论如何碰撞连接点都不会断开
